## Purpose
Icon set for OpenAI provider branding.

## Key Views/ViewModels/Services/Models
- `Contents.json` and `openai.svg`.

## Data Flow & Interfaces
Rendered in selection views when OpenAI is the active provider.

## Dependencies
SwiftUI image pipeline.

## Refactor Opportunities
Update the SVG if OpenAI refreshes its mark.
